Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
jeopardize \jeop"ard*ize\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Jeopardized}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Jeopardizing}.] To expose to loss or injury; to risk.
Syn: jeopard. [1913 Webster]
That he should jeopardize his willful head Only for spite at me. --H. Taylor. [1913 Webster]
